string-array.name: description
string-array.item: Join the platform by claiming a global name, attaching alongside it, your reachable contact, anytime, anywhere
Share your claimed name (eternal) with friends on social media. No need to share your mobile number again. Just tell what you will be eternally known as
Call friends and loved one from any device with eternal. No need to memorise their number. Just use their eternal
Invite friends to join the platform, claim their name and make your staying connected easier
